___autoPlay.description: Does the sound need to be played automatically at start ?
___autoPlay.title: Autoplay

___startTime.description: The starting time of the sound in milliseconds, if it needs to start after a certain time
___startTime.title: Start Time

___min.description: The minimum volume of the sound.
___min.title: Min

___max.description: The maximum volume of the sound.
___max.title: Max

___loop.description: Does the sound need to be looped automatically at the end of playing ?
___loop.title: Loop

___range.description: The range of the sound in degrees, where sound can be played from it's position before it can't be heared anymore. From 1 to 360.
___range.title: Range of the sound (only available with 3d sound)
